critique: The president is conveying sadness for the soldiers who fell during the rebellion. The president is also conveying joy for the opportunity to decorate the graves of the soldiers. The president is not conveying anger, fear, disgust, or surprise.The intensity of sadness is 7 because the president is directing the departments to be closed to enable the employees to participate in the decoration of the graves of the soldiers.The intensity of joy is 7 because the president is directing the departments to be closed to enable the employees to participate in the decoration of the graves of the soldiers.The intensity of anger is 1 because the president is not conveying anger.The intensity of fear is 1 because the president is not conveying fear.The intensity of disgust is 1 because the president is not conveying disgust.The intensity of surprise is 1 because the president is not conveying surprise.
